users.name: Beanz #stopthestink
users.description: Hard working Professional, single parent of one. Fighting for fresh air. üåç üå≤The Landfill is emitting toxic gases shut it down!

tweets.text: With the end of election publicity restrictions I am back as lead spokesperson for @NewsNBC our councillors and officers speak as one when we urge further action by @EnvAgencyMids to relieve the foul gas stink from Walleys Quarry landfill. @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL https://t.co/8gj36tg4D2

This is about the "Environment Agency" clearing habitat full of breeding birds, including priority & specially-protected species. Excuse seems to be that they've budgetary deadlines to meet. Anyone who's had misfortune to deal with @EnvAgency will know this is par for the course. https://t.co/q2nzBKvYxb

@tayz_BETH @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Looks like @RedIndustries2 have a new Ministry of Truth! Why are you gassing us? Destroying our health? Destroying our lives? @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe #stopthestink #Orwell1984 https://t.co/9Br42LytWO https://t.co/U07ErA5XZ8

@EnvAgencyMids What I think your hoping will happen is that these pathetic statements will calm people down until 2026 you will spit them out making out you care and hope we go away a bit. We won‚Äôt not until we can relax and breathe in our homes gardens and workplaces. TRY AGAIN EA

@EnvAgencyMids How has it been allowed to spread this far over such a long time?? With this many complaints about it?? What is being hidden?? How much is at stake here?? And for who?? We are not stupid. Why is big business more important than kid‚Äôs health?? Our health seems unimportant?? Why??

@EnvAgencyMids When are you going to help the situation directly and stop farting around the real issue???!! Help those directly affected, your admitting your ok with children suffering health issues and breathing in gas at school, your condoning the gassing of a hospital and fire station

@EnvAgencyMids Whatever we all know it‚Äôs not and still billowing out h2s and goes knows what we can‚Äôt smell . Don‚Äôt waste our time ! One very angry , tired and worried resident in a community exactly the same .

The Leader of the Council is seeking urgent action after the partial capping of Walleys Quarry landfill in Silverdale failed to address the issue of foul gassy odours leaking from the site. 

More here: https://t.co/1ZtPZuVrXB

urls.title: Chris Packham video leads furious protest over river estuary work
urls.description: The start of vegetation clearance work in preparation for the Lower Otter Restoration Project has been postponed.

tweets.text: @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Chris, well done! It's postponed. This is wonderful news. Congratualtions :) https://t.co/RMVLJFK9v1

@EnvAgencyMids I don‚Äôt even know where to start with this absolute load of bull your spouting again ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ biased biased biased NOT GOOD ENOUGH you‚Äôre just openly admitting your on their side as far as I‚Äôm concerned and that your not actually doing anything directly to help those suffering

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

They've admitted this is happening but refuse to take strong enough action to stop it. 
This has to be the big question. 
Are @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids @PHE_uk  using the people of Newcastle under Lyme as guinea pigs. Tell me another reason why they wont stop this. https://t.co/p4rXDi8c1K

@EnvAgencyMids The stink,destroying people‚Äôs health & lives. So, what‚Äôs the root cause? Do you know? But it‚Äôs business as usual from Monday @RedIndustries2 It‚Äôs out of control, you are adding to the chaos @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @StinkStopthe #crazy #stopthestink @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg https://t.co/bg8PbwxXjz

urls.title: Walleys Quarry Landfill Site - Latest Update - Environment Agency - Citizen Space
urls.description: Find and participate in consultations run by the Environment Agency

tweets.text:
Read our update to the situation at #WalleysQuarry üëâ https://t.co/o558iBcT3V

Our on-site inspection shows capping work required by the enforcement notice we issued is complete but we still need verification of the work by an independent construction quality assurance assessment https://t.co/12ep6fp39O

Walleys Quarry landfill will be restarting ‚Äòfull operations‚Äô from Monday. 

Red Industries says it‚Äôs been planned in full consultation with @EnvAgency

It put a pause on accepting most waste in March and has been found to have breached it‚Äôs permit 5 times since mid-Feb. https://t.co/AKbc0O8z43

Following the fire at a former waste site in #Telford last week our officers are also monitoring the #RiverSevern from south #Shrewsbury to north of #Gloucester to check for any environmental impacts

#Shropshire @TelfordWrekin @PHE_WestMids @shropsfire https://t.co/wb94TEmA0K

It took a while, but the communities suffering next to a problem landfill are finally being heard.
https://t.co/ysrv2Lc3xv

@nikkehmiller @StaffordshireCC try telling a young child who‚Äôs struggling to breath and vomiting it‚Äôs ok it‚Äôs only temporary , trying it to a pensioner  experiencing it . Oh you know you , @EnvAgencyMids and @PHE_WestMids can all do one . All a waste of taxpayers money , this utter 1/2

@DeniseO97662017 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids @PHE_uk @stokecity The Denis Coates building at Keele is beautiful just stinks so bad up there, maybe Coates family who do so much for community can help us @stokecity

urls.title: Guest blog with David Dangerfield
urls.description: Director of Water, Land and Biodiversity at the Environment Agency, David Dangerfield, discusses the issues surrounding water resilience and how The National Framework for Water Resources is working with local and regional groups to address these issues.

tweets.text:
England is at risk of facing #WaterShortages by 2050 due to #ClimateChange and population growth.

We're working with water companies to tackle this challenge and protect our water supplies.

Find out how: https://t.co/3OsurzkVGO https://t.co/Lu2mHFgV6F

urls.title: Achieving Net Zero carbon emissions: a review of the evidence behind carbon offsetting
urls.description: This report has reviewed the evidence behind carbon offsetting looking at a wide range of different offsetting approaches which could be used in the UK.

tweets.text:
When it comes to emissions, we know we should AVOID>REDUCE>SUBSTITUTE>COMPENSATE - only #offsetting #emissions that cannot be mitigated by other means. However, the @EnvAgency has published a review of 17 different #carbon offsetting approaches. 

https://t.co/Vl2AeLsxtQ
